actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit for 15 percent of the amounts paid by individuals for the installation of wood-burning stoves in their principal residences.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a non-refundable income tax credit for 15 percent of the amounts paid during the year for the installation of wood-burning stoves in their principal residences.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a credit for 15 percent of the amounts paid by individuals for the installation of wood-burning stoves in their principal residences.
